enchantment.fireworkfrenzy.takeoff.desc: Removes self-damage from your own rockets. Hope you're good at clutching.
enchantment.fireworkfrenzy.air_strike.de: Decreases the Crossbow charge time while rocket jumping.
enchantment.fireworkfrenzy.fixed_fuse.de: Removes the random fuse timer from Firework Rockets, allowing for mid-air jumps.
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.title: Firework Frenzy
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.crossbowCh: Time it takes for the Crossbow to load
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.quickCharg: Ticks per level quick charge removes from pull time
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.airStrikeJ: Air Strike charge time while rocket jumping
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.airStrikeG: Air Strike charge time while grounded
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.airStrikeD: Air Strike damage multiplier while rocket jumping
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.mobDamage: Base firework rocket damage against mobs
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.playerDama: Base firework rocket damage against players
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.fireballDa: Extra damage added by a fire charge (Explosive Enhancement Required)
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.burstChanc: Chance for Burst fireworks to disable shields
fireworkfrenzy.midnightconfig.falloffPer: Damage falloff per meter from shooter
